original_text: Thou shalt carry much seed out into the field, and shalt gather but little in; for the locust shall consume it.
korean_text: 네가 많은 종자를 들에 뿌릴지라도 메뚜기가 먹으므로 거둘 것이 적을 것이며

sentences.original_text: Thou shalt carry much seed out into the field
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 많은 씨앗을 밭으로 내어 갈 것이나

sentences.original_text: and shalt gather but little in
for the locust shall consume it
